name: Formless Adventure
description: Formless Adventure - A platformer that will allow you to spend a few hardcore hours emerged alongside your hero - Mr. Blubstache - a shapeless mass, who can change shape at will. He has a variety of forms, which all have different characteristics and abilities.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or Windows 8.1 or Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core2Duo E7300 @ 2.5 GHz or AMD Athlon II X2 240 @ 2.8 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTS 450 or AMD Radeon HD5670 (1024MB VRAM) DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or Windows 8.1 or Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i3 550 @ 3.0 GHz or AMD Phenom II X4 955 @ 3.2 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX560Ti or AMD Radeon HD6870 (1024MB VRAM) DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
